hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# set env variables export JAVA_HOME=/opt/app/jdk1.7.0_80 export ANT_HOME=/opt/app/apache-ant-1.9.6 export MVN_HOME=/opt/app/apache-maven-3.3.9 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANT_HOME/bin:$MVN_HOME/bin:$PATH component_repo=https://github.com/arshadmohammad/zookeeper.git component=zookeeper MVN_LOCAL_REPO=/opt/appData/ciMavenRepos/$component
if [ -d "$component" ]; then cd $component git reset --hard git clean -f git pull --verbose else git clone $component_repo -b maven $component --verbose fi cd $WORKSPACE/$component mvn clean package -DskipTests -Pcompile-native,package-native -Dmaven.repo.local=$MVN_LOCAL_REPO
